abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.description:
Creates a hail storm and lowers the speed.
Weather changes to a hail storm and the moves that deal damage by a Fire-type move get their power doubled when the user is not [[chained]] freezing or the opponent is burning.

abilities.name: Slow Start
abilities.description:
This Pokémon is not very powerful on the first turn, but gains power as the battle goes on.
This Pokémon cannot attack on its first turn.
